verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> Saul, <S%G4569><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> breathing out <S%G1709><s%> threatenings <S%G547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> slaughter <S%G5408><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> went <S%G4334><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> high priest, <S%G749><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> as he journeyed, <S%G4198><s%> he <S%G846><s%> came near <S%G1448><s%> Damascus: <S%G1154><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> suddenly <S%G1810><s%> there shined round about <S%G4015><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a light <S%G5457><s%> from <S%G575><s%> heaven: <S%G3772><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he fell <S%G4098><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%> and heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G848><s%> Saul, <S%G4549><s%> Saul, <S%G4549><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> persecutest <S%G1377><s%> thou me? <S%G3165><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> thou, Lord? <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> persecutest: <S%G1377><s%> it is hard <S%G4642><s%> for thee <S%G4671><s%> to kick <S%G2979><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the pricks. <S%G2759><s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> he trembling <S%G5141><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> astonished <S%G2284><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> wilt <S%G2309><s%> thou have me <S%G3165><s%> to do? <S%G4160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> said unto <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> Arise, <S%G450><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it shall be told <S%G2980><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> thou must <S%G1163><s%> do. <S%G4160><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> men <S%G435><s%> which journeyed with <S%G4922><s%> him <S%G846><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> speechless, <S%G1769><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%> a <S%G3303><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> seeing <S%G2334><s%> no man. <S%G3367><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Saul <S%G4569><s%> arose <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth; <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> when his <S%G848><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> were opened, <S%G455><s%> he saw <S%G991><s%> no man: <S%G3762><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> they led him by the hand, <S%G5496><s%> <S%G846><s%> and brought <S%G1521><s%> him into <S%G1519><s%> Damascus. <S%G1154><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> without <S%G3361><s%> sight, <S%G991><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> neither <S%G3756><s%> did eat <S%G5315><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> drink. <S%G4095><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Damascus <S%G1154><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Ananias; <S%G367><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a vision, <S%G3705><s%> Ananias. <S%G367><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am here, Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> said unto <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> Arise, <S%G450><s%> and go <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> street <S%G4505><s%> which is called <S%G2564><s%> Straight, <S%G2117><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> inquire <S%G2212><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> of Judas <S%G2455><s%> for one called <S%G3686><s%> Saul <S%G4569><s%> of Tarsus: <S%G5018><s%> for, <S%G1063><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> he prayeth, <S%G4336><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> hath seen <S%G1492><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a vision <S%G3705><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Ananias <S%G367><s%> coming in, <S%G1525><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> putting <S%G2007><s%> his hand <S%G5495><s%> on him, <S%G846><s%> that <S%G3704><s%> he might receive his sight. <S%G308><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> Ananias <S%G367><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> I have heard <S%G191><s%> by <S%G575><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> how much <S%G3745><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> he hath done <S%G4160><s%> to thy <S%G4675><s%> saints <S%G40><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem: <S%G2419><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> he hath <S%G2192><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> chief priests <S%G749><s%> to bind <S%G1210><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that call on <S%G1941><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> name. <S%G3686><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> Go thy way: <S%G4198><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> a chosen <S%G1589><s%> vessel <S%G4632><s%> unto me, <S%G3427><s%> to bear <S%G941><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> kings, <S%G935><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel: <S%G2474><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will show <S%G5263><s%> him <S%G846><s%> how great things <S%G3745><s%> he <S%G846><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> my name's sake. <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3686><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Ananias <S%G367><s%> went his way, <S%G565><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house; <S%G3614><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> putting <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Saul, <S%G4549><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> even Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> that appeared <S%G3700><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> way <S%G3598><s%> as <S%G3739><s%> thou camest, <S%G2064><s%> hath sent <S%G649><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> that <S%G3704><s%> thou mightest receive thy sight, <S%G308><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be filled <S%G4130><s%> with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had received <S%G2983><s%> meat, <S%G5160><s%> he was strengthened. <S%G1765><s%> Then <S%G1161><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> Saul <S%G4569><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> which were at <S%G1722><s%> Damascus. <S%G1154><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that heard <S%G191><s%> him were amazed, <S%G1839><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said; <S%G3004><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> he that destroyed <S%G4199><s%> them which called on <S%G1941><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> hither <S%G5602><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> that intent, <S%G5124><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he might bring <S%G71><s%> them <S%G846><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> chief priests? <S%G749><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Saul <S%G4569><s%> increased the more in strength, <S%G1743><s%> <S%G3123><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> confounded <S%G4797><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> which dwelt <S%G2730><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Damascus, <S%G1154><s%> proving <S%G4822><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> very Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> after that <S%G5613><s%> many <S%G2425><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> were fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> took counsel <S%G4823><s%> to kill <S%G337><s%> him: <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when Saul <S%G4569><s%> was come <S%G3854><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> he attempted <S%G3987><s%> to join himself <S%G2853><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> disciples: <S%G3101><s%> but <S%G2532><s%> they were all afraid <S%G5399><s%> <S%G3956><s%> of him, <S%G846><s%> and believed <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he was <S%G2076><s%> a disciple. <S%G3101><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> took <S%G1949><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and brought <S%G71><s%> him to <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> apostles, <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> declared <S%G1334><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> he had seen <S%G1492><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> way, <S%G3598><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he had spoken <S%G2980><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> he had preached boldly <S%G3955><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Damascus <S%G1154><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he spake boldly <S%G3955><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> disputed <S%G2980><s%> <S%G4802><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Grecians: <S%G1675><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> went about <S%G2021><s%> to slay <S%G337><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Which when <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> knew, <S%G1921><s%> they brought him down <S%G2609><s%> <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Caesarea, <S%G2542><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sent him forth <S%G1821><s%> <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Tarsus. <S%G5019><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3303><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%> rest <S%G1515><s%> throughout <S%G2596><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Samaria, <S%G4540><s%> and were edified; <S%G3618><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> walking <S%G4198><s%> in the <S%G3588><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in the <S%G3588><s%> comfort <S%G3874><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> were multiplied. <S%G4129><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass, <S%G1096><s%> as Peter <S%G4074><s%> passed <S%G1330><s%> throughout <S%G1223><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> quarters, he came down <S%G2718><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> saints <S%G40><s%> which dwelt <S%G2730><s%> at Lydda. <S%G3069><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> he found <S%G2147><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G444><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Aeneas, <S%G132><s%> which had kept his bed <S%G2621><s%> <S%G1909><s%> <S%G2895><s%> <S%G1537><s%> eight <S%G3638><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%> and <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> sick of the palsy. <S%G3886><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Aeneas <S%G132><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> maketh thee whole: <S%G2390><s%> <S%G4571><s%> arise, <S%G450><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> make thy bed. <S%G4766><s%> <S%G4572><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> he arose <S%G450><s%> immediately. <S%G2112><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that dwelt <S%G2730><s%> at Lydda <S%G3069><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sharon <S%G4565><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G3748><s%> turned <S%G1994><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Joppa <S%G2445><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> disciple <S%G3102><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Tabitha, <S%G5000><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> by interpretation <S%G1329><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> Dorcas: <S%G1393><s%> this woman <S%G3778><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of good <S%G18><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> almsdeeds <S%G1654><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> she did. <S%G4160><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> that she <S%G846><s%> was sick, <S%G770><s%> and died: <S%G599><s%> whom when <S%G1161><s%> they had washed, <S%G3068><s%> they <S%G846><s%> laid <S%G5087><s%> her in <S%G1722><s%> an upper chamber. <S%G5253><s%>
